revision.text: {{also|yícha}} ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|y-peg|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-cha|durative imperfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-CHA|cry}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is [[cry#Verb|cry]]ing, [[weep#Verb|weep]]ing ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|durative|∅/yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yishcha|yiicha|deiicha|nicha|wohcha|daahcha|yicha|daacha|jicha|dajicha}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |yícha|yiicha|deiicha|yínícha|woocha|daoocha|yícha|dáácha|jíícha|dajíícha}} {{nv-verbtable|FUTURE |deeshchah|diichah|dadiichah|dííchah|doohchah|dadoohchah|doochah|dadoochah|jidoochah|dazhdoochah}} ====Verbal stems==== * IMPERFECTIVE: -cha * PERFECTIVE: -cha * FUTURE: -chah * ITERATIVE: -chah * OPTATIVE: -cha ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|haachééh}}
